meanings.definition: Having a large and strong build.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler was the hulkiest person in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The elephant is the hulkiest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The hulkiest man in town tried to fit into a tiny car for a laugh.
meanings.sent4: His hulkiest muscles were like mountains on his arms.
meanings.sent5: The hulkiest oak tree in the forest stood tall and proud.

meanings.definition: The largest and most powerful in a group.
meanings.sent1: Among the superheroes, he was considered the hulkiest.
meanings.sent2: The battleship was the hulkiest vessel in the navy.
meanings.sent3: The hulkiest cake at the party was devoured in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood like the hulkiest giant in the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The hulkiest of the buildings in the city was a skyscraper reaching the clouds.
